restaurants.description: rj学长吃烤肉时都会惦记的店

restaurants.description: 学长推荐，贵

restaurants.name: Sagapò Greek Street Food
restaurants.address: Via Don Giuseppe Andreoli, 7, 20158 Milano MI
restaurants.description: 希腊餐厅，卷饼加的酱味重些

restaurants.name: Pan Sushi
restaurants.description: 好吃实惠，适合学生

restaurants.name: 东北小菜 Dongbei Food
restaurants.description: 凉菜卤味十分下酒，推荐麻辣拌和鸡架，地方很小适合买回家吃

restaurants.name: Xiao Hutong
restaurants.description: 特别特别特别好吃的麻辣烫，能加卤鸡爪

restaurants.name: Tender
restaurants.description: happy hour是吃过最好的

restaurants.name: Restaurant Ma La Tang North Gate
restaurants.description: 回国的感觉

restaurants.name: 思源中国兰州牛肉面
restaurants.description: 牛肉面一绝，试试二柱子

restaurants.name: Jollibee Milano
restaurants.description: maybe世界第一炸鸡

restaurants.name: Mr. Jiao
restaurants.description: 椒先生麻辣烫，不太辣，汤头很棒

restaurants.name: Doppio Malto Milano Duomo
restaurants.description: 能吃上一口热乎披萨，烤肉拼盘好吃

restaurants.name: Dream Korean Restaurant
restaurants.address: 谷歌地图不准，可直接搜店名
restaurants.description: 炸鸡炸鸡，超好吃韩式炸鸡，天天同学的心中第一

restaurants.name: Ristorante Taiwan
restaurants.description: 台湾菜很好吃，推荐五味豆腐和卤肉饭！

restaurants.name: 满满登登
restaurants.description: 主打东北菜，烧烤炸串都很香

restaurants.name: La Hora Feliz
restaurants.description: 点一杯喝的（13欧起鸡尾酒），然后随便吃，提拉米苏很好吃，服务员也会拿着大盘子送菜

restaurants.name: Mao Hotpot 毛灶火锅
restaurants.description: 自助火锅，晚上菜品丰富但贵一点，饮品额外收费

restaurants.name: YuanZi HotPot Porta Venezia
restaurants.description: 火锅自助，种类丰富，虾滑，牛蹄筋，猪蹄这些小菜都好吃

restaurants.name: La via della seta 大西北
restaurants.description: 正宗西北菜，羊肉，羊杂，土豆泥，手抓饭！不会缺斤少两

restaurants.name: Ravioli Bao
restaurants.description: 包子饺子小店，不是大餐哦，周日休息

restaurants.name: Sumire
restaurants.description:
咖喱饭好吃（但是只有中午菜单有
晚上菜单的话就是些海鲜类
高峰期可能需要提前预定

restaurants.name: YiKo DimSum一口砂锅
restaurants.description:
味道不差
不止砂锅 别的什么都做的挺好的店
服务员好像只有一个中国人

restaurants.name: 周真真南昌拌粉
restaurants.description: 爱吃拌粉的强烈推荐

restaurants.name: 东北是家Dongbeiciaga
restaurants.description: 19.9的晚餐自助包饮料包甜品还有很多硬菜

restaurants.name: Roadhouse Meatery
restaurants.address: Shopping District, Piazza Tre Torri c/o, 20122 Milano MI
restaurants.description: Roadhouse是连锁店，每周日10欧排骨畅吃真的非常好吃 像奥尔良口味的排骨

restaurants.name: Pizzium - Isola
restaurants.description: 意大利本地人带着吃的披萨，还不错

restaurants.name: Ristorante Poporoya
restaurants.description: 日本人开的店，比较正宗

restaurants.name: Il Forno del Sud
restaurants.description: 披萨便宜好吃，一个只要5-10欧，8.5欧的肉很多

restaurants.name: Bakers Tinapayan
restaurants.description: 菲律宾人面包店，中国老面包味，1欧一个。egg pie是kfc蛋挞味，coco bread是椰蓉面包，还有菠萝包，布朗尼

restaurants.name: DASHI PASTICCERIA
restaurants.address: Via Nicola Antonio Porpora, 14, 20131 Milano MI
restaurants.description: 中国人开的甜品店，好吃，店内装修很漂亮

restaurants.name: Cioccolateria belga Charlotte Dusart
restaurants.description: 比利时巧克力经理开的店，手工糖果流芯巧克力，会给你她家的巧克力种类册，价格略低于Venchi

restaurants.name: 杭州小笼包
restaurants.description: 全米兰最好吃的包子店，小贵但值得（一个不写评论的朋友在他家写了评论）

restaurants.name: Dipaola
restaurants.address: Via delle Forze Armate, 328, 20152 Milano MI
restaurants.description: 这有oO从出生到现在吃过最好吃的泡芙，回购30多次，每年早上爆满，旁边还有宝藏公园。端着点心看天鹅晒太阳，chill～

restaurants.name: Istanbul Best 2
restaurants.description: kebab和披萨很好吃，米兰排的上号

restaurants.name: Royal Duomo Turkish Kebap Pizza Grill Bar&Cocktail
restaurants.description: 土耳其同学觉得最好吃的kebab，味道好而且服务nice

restaurants.name: 二舅卤味
restaurants.description: 可以辣，一个江西人会喜欢的店

restaurants.name: Mao Hunan
restaurants.address: Via Nicola Antonio Porpora, 5, 20131 Milano MI
restaurants.description: 人称毛爷爷，湖南风味，吃辣的福音，一定要预约，店里很多意大利人

restaurants.name: 周真真南昌拌粉
restaurants.description: 大家褒贬不一，但南昌人肯定这家辣度ok

restaurants.name: Ristorante Cinese Shi yunjia
restaurants.description: 煎饼果子，牛肉面，韭菜盒子，朴素但好吃的店

restaurants.name: 燉物
restaurants.description: 拉面很好吃，肉很多，还有章鱼小丸子

restaurants.name: BeiYuan Hotpot Maciachini 北园火锅
restaurants.address: Via Luigi Federico Menabrea, 20, 20159 Milano MI
restaurants.description: 好吃的火锅店，花胶鸡好喝，小贵

restaurants.name: Basi 巴适
restaurants.description: 糖醋脆皮土豆，老麻抄手个头巨大，碗杂面料巨足，烫饭，麻辣香锅

restaurants.name: Houseki Sushi
restaurants.description: 比较贵，十分好吃的日料且服务态度好

restaurants.name: 马路边边 la stradina
restaurants.description: 小龙虾，烧烤，酸辣粉，故名思义就是国内烧烤摊的感觉

restaurants.name: Ristorante Cinese dong bei si fang cai
restaurants.description: 价格很便宜且地道的东北菜

restaurants.name: Sweet Republic Cake Studio - 甜蜜共和
restaurants.description: 很国内的味道，蛋糕好吃，可定做复杂蛋糕

restaurants.name: Gelateria Dolcemania, Bovisa
restaurants.address: Via Don Giovanni Verità, 1, 20158 Milano MI
restaurants.description: Gelato店，便宜，量大且味道不错，bovisa学生的充电桩

restaurants.name: 东北饺子馆
restaurants.description: 西葫芦萝卜鸡蛋饺子好吃，皮很劲道，味道不错

restaurants.name: 成都小馆Ristorante Cheng Du
restaurants.description: 冒烤鸭好吃！爱吃辣的冲

restaurants.name: Miss Cake 蜜思蛋糕
restaurants.description: 芋泥类甜品的福音
